< from django.views.generic import ListView from .models import Library, Book class LibraryDetailView(ListView): model = Book template_name = 'relationship_app/list_books.html' # Or 'relationship_app/library_detail.html' if distinct context_object_name = 'books' def get_queryset(self): library_id = self.kwargs['library_id'] return Book.objects.filter(library__id=library_id)
